alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Marion; Wyandot (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 10:46AM EDT until July 23 at 11:30AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marion County in north central Ohio... Eastern Wyandot County in northwestern Ohio... Crawford County in north central Ohio... * Until 1130 AM EDT. * At 1045 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sycamore to near Kenton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Marion, Bucyrus, Upper Sandusky, Galion, Crestline, Prospect, New Washington, Sycamore, La Rue, Morral, Waldo, Chatfield, Marseilles, Benton, Nevada, Caledonia, New Bloomington, Green Camp, Tiro and North Robinson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
